facts.fact_text: Retail sales in Bulgaria rose by 7.7% year-on-year in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Retail sales in Bulgaria rose by 7.7% year-on-year in December 2025

facts.fact_text: The 7.7% increase in retail sales followed a 3.1% gain in the previous month.

evidences.evidence_text: following a 3.1% gain in the previous month.

facts.fact_text: This marked the sharpest rise in retail activity in eleven months.

evidences.evidence_text: This marked the sharpest rise in retail activity in eleven months

facts.fact_text: Sales increased sharply in automotive fuel and lubricants (11.8% vs 10.3%).

evidences.evidence_text: sales increased sharply in automotive fuel and lubricants (11.8% vs 10.3%)

facts.fact_text: Sales increased sharply in non-food products excluding fuel (15.7% vs 5.9% in November).

evidences.evidence_text: sales increased sharply in non-food products excluding fuel (15.7% vs 5.9% in November)

facts.fact_text: Activity declined further in food, beverages, and tobacco (-4.6% vs -2%).

evidences.evidence_text: activity declined further in food, beverages, and tobacco (-4.6% vs -2%)

facts.fact_text: On a monthly basis, retail sales grew by 1.6% in December.

evidences.evidence_text: On a monthly basis, retail sales grew by 1.6% in December

facts.fact_text: Monthly retail sales growth of 1.6% followed an upwardly revised 0.2% growth in the preceding period.

evidences.evidence_text: following an upwardly revised 0.2% growth in the preceding period.

evidence.evidence_text: Retail sales in Bulgaria rose by 7.7% year-on-year in December 2025
